org.s1.cluster.dds.file

Class FileStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.s1.cluster.dds.DistributedDataSource
      • org.s1.cluster.dds.file.FileStorage

  • public class FileStorage
extends DistributedDataSource
    Distributed file storage - use it for storing files, internally uses FileLocalStorage
